Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes retail licensees of liquor and/or wine for off-premises consumption to apply for licensure as a retail food store
Summary: Authorizes retail licensees of liquor and/or wine for off-premises consumption to apply for licensure as a retail food store.
LawCode: Add ยง132, ABC L; add ยง501, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law and the agriculture and markets law, in relation to authorizing retail licensees of liquor and/or wine for off-premises consumption to apply for licensure as a retail food store
